verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tore] [ARG1: into the ' fake news '] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] and accused the media of covering up First Lady Melania Trump 's recovery – and accused the press of promoting ' vicious ' rumors about her .
